business_strategies.strategy: Start with free workshops then charge once refined

problems_solutions.problem: How to become AI expert quickly to teach businesses
problems_solutions.solution: Learn from free YouTube videos and repackage into workshops
steps: Find high-quality YouTube videos on AI topics
Get transcript and use GPT-5 to create workshop plan
Use slideshow creation tools to build presentation
Start with free workshops to refine
